lines.text:
[Frowning]
Annette, you are the governor's daughter. Think what would happen if you were found here, in the arms of a pirate!

[Breathless]
Don't ask me to think, Jean. Kiss me instead!

[Told by the British that a battle is coming and he *better* be on the winning side]
Oh, the side I choose will be the winning side!
When a man loses everything else, he still has the sea. This deck is the only country we have.
This is all the country I want.
